feat.value: If a thought that has been inflated with arrogance
question in your thoughts whether you have oberved the commandments:
whether you rejoice in the glory of your enemies and are pained by their failures;
whether you have become a worthless slave in your own eyes and a sinner beyond everyone else.
And, in these things, do not consider greatness, as if you were successful in everything.
For you know that this thought destroys everything.
